ReplicationConfiguration.description: An object representing the replication configuration for a registry.

properties.name: Rules
properties.description: An array of objects representing the replication rules for a replication configuration. A replication configuration may contain a maximum of 10 rules.

type.description: An array of objects representing the replication rules for a replication configuration. A replication configuration may contain a maximum of 10 rules.

ReplicationRule.description: An array of objects representing the details of a replication destination.

properties.name: RepositoryFilters
properties.description: An array of objects representing the details of a repository filter.

type.description: An array of objects representing the details of a repository filter.

properties.name: Destinations
properties.description: An array of objects representing the details of a replication destination.

type.description: An array of objects representing the details of a replication destination.

RepositoryFilter.description: An array of objects representing the details of a repository filter.

Filter.description: The repository filter to be applied for replication.

ReplicationDestination.description: An array of objects representing the details of a replication destination.

RegistryId.description: The account ID of the destination registry to replicate to.

resource.description: The AWS::ECR::ReplicationConfiguration resource configures the replication destinations for an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon Private ECR). For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECR/latest/userguide/replication.html

attributes.description: The AWS::ECR::ReplicationConfiguration resource configures the replication destinations for an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon Private ECR). For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECR/latest/userguide/replication.html

properties.name: RegistryId
properties.description: The RegistryId associated with the aws account.

type.description: The RegistryId associated with the aws account.
